column5: I'm looking for some nice Jumbo leeches to pick up anywhere between FT. Francis and Kenora. Does anyone know where they might have a supply of nice sized leeches? I'll be heading up to LOW late next week.
Thanks. I've stopped there before. Its a nice shop. Does theFigure 8 shop on the water carry leeches?
Figure 8 does carry them but they are in short supply around Kenora right now.
You could also call Sunset Baits and see if they have any.Sunset Baits1407 Highway 17 E Kenora, ON P9N 1M1(807) 468-9567

Yes. They are tough to get at this time of year up there at this time of year, especially jumbo leeches. I was hoping someone had a line on a supply of them. Thanks all for the help, if you happen to find someone that will have some by 8/29 please reply to post. Good fishing guys and thanks again.
